ingredients.ingredient: 2 (16 ounce) cans dark red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
2 large Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and diced
1 bunch red globe grapes, halved and seeded
1 ½ cups creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™

cookingTips: Toss diced apples with a little vinegar or lemon juice immediately after cutting to prevent browning
Combine all ingredients just before serving to prevent beans from softening too much
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the cook on preventing oxidation in salads and managing timing to maintain texture and freshness in composed salads.
